Table of Contents

Enum PhotonStateType

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo
Assembly
Vts.dll

PhotonStateType is a bitmap of Photon.StateFlag. Combinations of bits indicate the current state of the photon. These states communicate what to do with the photon. ref: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/37921/Enums-Flags-and-Csharp-Oh-my-bad-pun.aspx or http://stackoverflow.com/questions/93744/most-common-c-bitwise-operations | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | 8000 4000 2000 1000 0800 0400 0200 0100 0080 0040 0020 0010 0008 0004 0002 0001 <- transport flags -> <- virtual flags these with "0000" added in lowest bits ->

[Flags]
public enum PhotonStateType

Fields

Absorbed = 4

photon was absorbed, used only in analog random walk process

Alive = 1

photon alive

ExitedDomain = 2

photon exited domain

KilledOverMaximumCollisions = 16

photon killed because number of collisions over maximum

KilledOverMaximumPathLength = 8

photon killed because path length too long

KilledRussianRoulette = 32

photon killed by Russian Roulette

None = 0

no bits set

PseudoBoundingCylinderVolumeVirtualBoundary = PseudoDiffuseReflectanceVirtualBoundary | PseudoSurfaceRadianceVirtualBoundary

photon pseudo-collision at BoundingVolume Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoBoundingVolumeTissueBoundary = 512

photon pseudo-collision at bounding volume boundary

PseudoDiffuseReflectanceVirtualBoundary = 65536

photon pseudo-collision at DiffuseReflectance Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoDiffuseTransmittanceVirtualBoundary = 131072

photon pseudo-collision at DiffuseTransmittance Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoGenericVolumeVirtualBoundary = 524288

photon pseudo-collision at Generic Volume Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoReflectedTissueBoundary = 64

photon pseudo-collision at reflected tissue boundary

PseudoSpecularReflectanceVirtualBoundary = 262144

photon pseudo-collision at SpecularReflectance Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoSpecularTissueBoundary = 256

photon pseudo-collision at specular tissue boundary

PseudoSurfaceRadianceVirtualBoundary = 1048576

photon pseudo-collision at Dosimetry Virtual Boundary (VB)

PseudoTransmittedTissueBoundary = 128

photon pseudo-collision at transmitted tissue boundary
